entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
